entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use generic math in System.Numerics.Vectors test utils #60365
    Future
  • [mono] Crash in github runner due to null AssemblyLoadContext.GetLoadContext result #60348
    6.0.0
  • Assert in mini-codegen.c on Mono x86 #60347
    7.0.0
  • Enum.GetName returns wrong name of enum value. #60346
  • Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility should reference the latest System.Data.SqlClient #60345
    6.0.0
  • Crossgen2: System.BadImageFormatException: Read out of bounds #60343
  • [API Proposal]: Add String.Join(char, IEnumerable<string>) #60342
  • RuntimeIdentifierTests.VerifyOSRid started failing on macOS ARM64 #60341
  • [wasm][debugger] Evaluate testList[0] #60340
  • [SyncContext(contextName)] #60336
  • [iOS] Test_GetCurrentMethod_Inlineable test failed #60334
  • Create microbenchmarks for SequenceReader<T>.TryReadExact #60332
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'child->isContained()' #60330
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Inlining/NoThrowInline/NoThrowInline.sh #60324
  • Code cleanup: Remove EffectiveKeyLength from BasicSymmetricCipher types #60322
    7.0.0
  • DAC crashes WinDBGX on DBG/CHK builds #60321
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.CounterCreationDataCollectionTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_CreateCategory #58413
    Future
  • RyuJIT: Invalidly optimized negated division #60297
    7.0.0
  • DataContractJsonSerializer with JObject results in stack overflow #59218
  • .NET 6 regression on writing to character device #59754
    6.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter tests fail on Windows 10 #25786
    Future
  • PerformanceCounter_IncrementBy_IncrementByReadOnly Failure for Windows 8.1 #24176
    Future
  • InstanceDataCollection_* failures in CI #25253
    Future
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.Match_ExcessPrefix Failing in CI #59541
    7.0.0
  • .NET misreports current culture after upgrading to .NET6 #60296
    7.0.0
  • JIT: crc32 bad codegen for contained constant address #59714
    7.0.0
  • File.ReadAllBytes* should support non-seekable files #58383
    7.0.0
  • [libraries] System.Native fails to build with clang-13 #60326
  • SignedCms: does not enable RSASSA-PSS signing #60125
    7.0.0
  • plugins fail to load for dotnet 6 single file - self contained app #59961
    6.0.0
  • [JIT][arm64] recognize Interlocked.Increment in volatile increment #60021
    7.0.0
  • [JIT][arm64] double dmb #60023
    7.0.0
  • Delete Microsoft.IO.Redist.csproj #58334
    7.0.0
  • Error in the documentation of the Task.ContinueWith method? #59620
    7.0.0
  • API Proposal: SequenceReader<T>.TryRead overloads to read a specified number of elements #30778
    Future
  • runtime.osx-arm64.runtime.native.System.IO.Ports missing #59972
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Make all delegates support fully general generics (In support of Action/Func of everything) #60377
  • Remove duplicate entries from dotnet --info #60376
    area-Host
  • Update SuperPMI CI automation #60375
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add design details regarding dynamic buffers in struct marshalling #60374
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Remove RC2 EffectiveKeyLength #60373
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix PerformanceCounter tests #60372
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter
  • [release/6.0] Move 2 Drawing APIs that are not implemented in netfx to net6.0 or later #60371
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Drawing
  • Eliminate pre-built assets during source-build #60370
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Ini` #60368
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [NO MERGE] [mono] testing initial bits of byref of byref #60367
    * NO MERGE *, area-VM-meta-mono
  • SrcGen fast-path serialization for nullable structs (#59719) #60366
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Fixed stress #60364
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Implement IAsyncEnumerable<T>.ToBlockingEnumerable #60363
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix CRC32 encoding #60360
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Port: Fix StartTLS in DirectoryService.Protocols in 6.0 to main #60359
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • prevent manifest sending for special cased event sources #60357
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • JIT: fix interaction of GDV and boxing #60355
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove FlakyAppHostTests category in installer tests #60354
    area-Host
  • [reflection] Initialize default ALC gchandle in GetLoadContext #60350
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Add Fuzzlyn to CI #60344
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][test] BrowserHttpHandler stream large responses with SetBrowserResponseStreamingEnabled #60339
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, test enhancement, 7.0.0
  • [WIP]: Fix broken callstacks in interpreter on MonoVM. #60338
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Experiment with Roslyn optimization for ROS<T> in assembly data section #60327

Merged

  • Constraint generic work #60320
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Remove DIV(NEG(a), C) => DIV(a, NEG(C)) opt #60312
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix: CTS.TryReset() concurrency issue #60182 #60323
    area-System.Threading
  • Merge RC2 tag into release/6.0 branch #60358
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Adjust SkipOnCoreClr for Match_ExcessPrefix test #59564
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix ref field loading, when metadata type is actually ref type #60356
  • Remove `Microsoft.IO.Redist`. #58359
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix System.Numerics.Vectors tests on iOS and other FullAOT targets #60335
    area-System.Numerics, os-ios
  • Fix build with clang 13 #60328
    area-PAL-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix CRC32 encoding #60329
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support unseekable filestream when ReadAllBytes[Async] #58434
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add test for struct with ref field #60352
  • Don't include s390x in coreclr outerloop runs #60351
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #60318
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Add tizen armel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement RSA-PSS signature for CmsSigner #60316
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Eliminate pre-built assets during source-build #60315
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update Package Validation dependency and update Suppression files #60306
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Make upgrade install new host first, then uninstall old #60317
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix build break #60333
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Make upgrade install new host first, then uninstall old #60325
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][interp] Change GC state explicitly #60242
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Optimize redundant memory barriers on arm/arm64 #60219
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Finish59071 update ci argsh for r6.0 #60100
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.0
  • Remove ObjectDisposedException from the docs of the Task.ContinueWith #59822
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • lateapexearlyspeed-issue-30778 Create method: TryReadExact(). #57921
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add SetLastError to GdiPlus methods (#59096) #60201
    Servicing-approved
  • Add runtime.osx-arm64.runtime.native.System.IO.Ports proj file for pa… #60310
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add osx-arm64.runtime.native.System.IO.Ports #60084
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Fix license header in a few new files #59910
    area-Meta
  • Fix typo in comment for UseUtcTimestamp #60043
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration` #57414
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix: CTS.TryReset() concurrency issue #60182 #60224
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution

Updated

  • Loop Alignment support for Arm64 #60135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reflection Invoke share more coreclr/mono #60270
    area-System.Reflection
  • Update THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES.TXT #60092
    area-Setup
  • [wasm] rationalize internal exports #60075
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [metadata] Replace uses of MonoType:byref by a getter #60313
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Consume PosixSignal in Hosting.Systemd's SystemdLifetime #59880
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Test fix: FileStream DeleteOnClose run on OuterLoop with longer timeout #60149
    area-System.IO
  • [mono][interp] Implement tailcalls #59799
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • FileStatus.Unix/Process.Unix: align caching of user identity. #60160
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix VS4Mac crash report and core dump generation perf problems #60319
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • make CryptQueryObject call compliant to interop guidelines #60218
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Stabilize for RTM #60294
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60265
    area-Build-mono
  • Refactoring XmlConvert #60285
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [mono/win] Build native runtime as Debug again #60263
    area-Build-mono
  • Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #60275
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.EnvironmentVariables` #57433
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.CommandLine` #57432
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • fix https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/60282 #60283
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • FileSystem.Unix: Directory.Delete: remove per item syscall. #59520
    area-System.IO
  • Add API entry for JsonDocument converter #60236
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 7.0.0
